subject: Football
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: For Notre Dame’s Manti Te’o and West Virginia’s Geno Smith, the N.F.L. draft was a bit of a waiting game, with Te’o selected 38th over all, followed by Smith.
snippet: For Notre Dame’s Manti Te’o and West Virginia’s Geno Smith, the N.F.L. draft was a bit of a waiting game, with Te’o selected 38th over all, followed by Smith.
